title: What is the rezoning request or hearing that is displayed by public notice sign on North side of Eastwood Rd, just east of the Mayfaire Entrance, across the street from Point Summerset?
text:
There is a rezoning on the agenda for  tomorrow night's council
meeting for .282 acres of 4908 Wrightsville Avenue from residential to
office. Here is the agenda item.
http://wilmington.granicus.com/MetaViewer.php?view_id=20&event_id=25&meta_id=81281
